dashboard.layout: Sidebar navigation + Top Header + Main Content Area
dashboard.kpi_cards: Simple cards with Icon + Value + Label + Trend Indicator

products.layout: Full-width Table with Filters on top
products.table_columns: Image, Name, SKU, Category, Price, Stock, Status, Actions

stock.layout: Split view: Stock Levels (Table) + Movement History (List)
stock.indicators: Low Stock (<10) = Red Text/Badge, Medium (<50) = Orange, Good = Green

reports.layout: Filter Bar (Date Range, Branch) + Summary Cards + Charts + Detailed Table

universal_guidelines: LANGUAGE: All UI text must be in ALBANIAN (sq).
THEME: Light Mode is default. Do not use dark gradients.
PRIMARY COLOR: Use Red (#E53935) for primary actions (Save, Add, Confirm).
ACCENT: Use Teal (#00B9D7) for table row hovers and secondary highlights.
SPACING: Use generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside cards, but keep tables dense for data visibility.
TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI components for all interactive elements (Select, Dialog, Dropdown).
FORMS: Use react-hook-form + zod for validation.
